text.page:
117
088-59a @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya pra tI t+ya sa mut+pA da hr-i da ya nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i snying po zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos gang rgyus 'byung de dag gi/ /rgyu dang de 'gog gang yin pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal te/ /dge sbyong chan po 'di skad gsungs/ /ye d+harmA he tu pra b+ha bA he tun te ShAn+ta thA ga to h+ya ba data/ te ShAny+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e baM bA dI ma hA shra ma NaH/ snying po 'di lan gcig brjod pas sdig pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro/ /mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad zhi zhing bzlog par 'gyur ro/ /dngos po gang la dmigs te brjod na sangs rgyas kyi sku'am/ mchod rten du byas par 'gyur mchod pa gang la dmigs te/ brjod na 'jig rten gyi khams gang bcom phul bar 'gyur ro/ /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i snying po rdzogs so//
